website_summaries.verdict: The Vans Checkerboard SK8-Hi presents the classic elements of the SK8-Hi dressed in eye-catching print with high-class performance. This kick has old-school yet modern elements with ample support and comfort for the all-day use, on and off the board. However, some skaters complained about insufficient cushioning and ventilation. Overall, this modern-age punk is a real deal for buyers who are rooting for an affordable yet eye-catching shoe.
pros: The Vans Checkerboard SK8-Hi is found at a budget-friendly price point
Many users liked the comfortable fit of this pair that is suitable for everyday wear
Wide-footed users even testified for this pair’s cozy strides
The neck breaking style has been praised by some skaters
Several wearers cited about the lightness of the Checkerboard SK8-Hi
The majority of the users recommended this pair to their friends
This shoe runs true to size
Many reviewers praised the high-quality materials used in this model
Some skaters enjoyed the excellent board feel and ground grip of this kick that makes maneuvering easy
A handful of users mentioned about this shoe's ample ankle support
This provides protection against painful collisions with the board decks
This sneaker is durable for several buyers
Some skaters were amazed that only minimal wear marks were observed after several skateboarding sessions
cons: The Vans Checkerboard SK8-Hi has poor cushioning, disclosed by some disappointed Thrashers
The poor ventilation has been criticized by some wearers
Quite a few revealed about this shoe's lack of arch support

customer_reviews.title: I got with a different color than I thought, ...
customer_reviews.text: I got with a different color than I thought , on the pictures looks one color and then you get a different one, nothing wrong at all.. but the pictures sometimes lie.
